section.title: Attaching a Storage Domain to a Data Center
section.para: Attach a storage domain to a data center.

procedure.title: Attaching a Storage Domain to a Data Center

step.para: Click the Storage resource tab, and select a storage domain from the results list.
Click the Data Centers tab in the details pane.
Click Attach to open the Attach to Data Center window.
Select the radio button of the appropriate data center.
Click OK to attach the storage domain.

section.para: The storage domain is attached to the data center and is automatically activated.
